0.text: Innate: Periodically, Vi's next ability hit will generate a  shield equal to 13% of her maximum health for 3 seconds.

1.text: The cooldown is  reduced by 3 seconds each time  Denting Blows is triggered.

Denting Blows

0.text: Active: Vi  charges while being  slowed by 15% for up to 4 seconds to increase Vault Breaker's  range, speed, and damage over the first 1.25 seconds of the channel.
0.html: Active: Vi charges while being slowed by 15% for up to 4 seconds to increase Vault Breaker's  range, speed, and damage over the first 1.25 seconds of the channel.

slowed

1.text: Vault Breaker can be recast at any time within the duration. If the charge completes without reactivation, Vault Breaker is cancelled and put on  full cooldown. If the charge is  interrupted, it will be put on a  3-second cooldown.
1.html: Vault Breaker can be recast at any time within the duration. If the charge completes without reactivation, Vault Breaker is cancelled and put on  full cooldown. If the charge is interrupted, it will be put on a  3-second cooldown.
markedPassages: full
interrupted
3-second

2.text: Recast: Vi  dashes in the target direction to deal physical damage to enemies she passes through, increased by 0% − 100% (based on channel time).
2.html: Recast: Vi dashes in the target direction to deal physical damage to enemies she passes through, increased by 0% − 100% (based on channel time).
markedPassages: dashes

3.text: Vi stops upon hitting an enemy  champion,  knocking them back over 0.75 seconds, while non-champion enemies hit are instead  pulled towards her.
3.html: Vi stops upon hitting an enemy champion, knocking them back over 0.75 seconds, while non-champion enemies hit are instead pulled towards her.

knocking them back

0.text: Passive: Vi's basic attacks  on-hit and  Vault Breaker apply a stack of Denting Blows to enemies hit for 4 seconds, which refreshes on subsequent hits. The third stack consumes them all to deal bonus physical damage, capped at 300 against non-champions, and inflict  20% armor reduction for 4 seconds.

1.text: After triggering Denting Blows, Vi gains  bonus attack speed for 4 seconds, which refreshes on subsequent triggers.

0.text: Active: Vi singles out the target enemy  champion and  dashes with  displacement immunity towards them, during which they are  revealed. Upon approaching within 300-units, she  dashes through and grabs them,  knocking them up for 1.3 seconds and dealing physical damage after 0.75 seconds.

Passive: Vi's basic attacks  on-hit and  Vault Breaker apply a stack of Denting Blows to enemies hit for 4 seconds, which refreshes on subsequent hits. The third stack consumes them all to deal bonus physical damage, capped at 300 against non-champions, and inflict  20% armor reduction for 4 seconds.
After triggering Denting Blows, Vi gains  bonus attack speed for 4 seconds, which refreshes on subsequent triggers.

Active: Vi empowers her next basic attack within 6 seconds to have an  uncancellable windup, gain  50 bonus range and trigger a blast in the target's direction that deals modified physical damage to enemies hit in a cone. Relentless Force can  critically strike for (75% +  35%) AD bonus physical damage.

Active: Vi singles out the target enemy  champion and  dashes with  displacement immunity towards them, during which they are  revealed. Upon approaching within 300-units, she  dashes through and grabs them,  knocking them up for 1.3 seconds and dealing physical damage after 0.75 seconds.

Unique – Trinket: Consume a charge to place an invisible Totem Ward at the target location, which grants sight of the surrounding area for 90 − 120 (based on average of all champion levels) seconds (240 − 120 (based on average of all champion levels) seconds recharge time; 2 charges; 600 range).
consume.originText: UNIQUE – TRINKET: Consume a charge to place an invisible  Totem Ward at the target location, which grants  sight of the surrounding area for 90 − 120 (based on average of all champion levels) seconds (240 − 120 (based on average of all champion levels) seconds recharge time; 2 charges; 600 range).

stats.originHTML:
Stats

+7% omnivamp against monsters

passive.originHTML:
Passive

Unique – Sear: Damaging monsters burns them for 60 (+ 30% AP) (+ 5% bonus AD) (+ 2% bonus health) magic damage over 5 seconds. Omnivamp against monsters provided by this item is not reduced by area of effect damage.
Unique – Challenging Path: Using Smite 5 times consumes this item to upgrade your Smite into Challenging Smite, doubling its damage, and grants all of this item's effects permanently after a 2.5-second delay.
Unique – Huntsman: Killing large monsters grants 60 bonus experience. The first large monster killed grants an additional 150 bonus experience, for a total of 210. If you are at least 2 levels below the average level of the game, large monster kills grant 50 bonus experience per level below the average level of all players in the game. If your gold from minions is greater than 40% your gold from monsters, a lane minion will grant 13 less gold and 50% reduced experience. This penalty is removed at 20 minutes.
Unique – Recoup: Regenerate up to 8 − 18 (based on level) mana per second while in the jungle or river, based on missing mana.
passive.originText: UNIQUE – SEAR: Damaging monsters burns them for 60 (+ 30% AP) (+ 5% bonus AD) (+ 2% bonus health) magic damage over 5 seconds. Omnivamp against monsters provided by this item is not reduced by area of effect damage.

passive.originHTML:
Passive

Unique – Ever Rising Moon: Hitting an enemy champion with 2 separate attacks or abilities within 1.5 seconds deals them bonus physical damage equal to ( 6% / 3%) of target's maximum health and grants you 15% bonus movement speed and a shield for ( 160 / 80) (+ ( 35% / 17.5%) bonus AD) for 2 seconds (( 8 / 16) second cooldown).
Mythic Passive: Empowers each of your other Legendary items with 4% armor penetration, and 5 bonus movement speed.

Unique – Carve: Dealing physical damage to an enemy champion applies a stack of Carve for 6 seconds, stacking up to 6 times. Each stack inflicts 5% armor reduction, up to 30% at 6 stacks.
